This map shows the distribution of HUC10 watersheds across parts of New Mexico and Arizona. Watersheds are color-coded by the larger HUC4 watershed that contains them. You can find the HUC ID for each watershed by clicking the feature on the map.

```{r}
#| fig-height: 4

library(sf)
library(mapview)

map_colors <- c(
  "#054141", "#08605F", "#638A79", "#8E936D", "#9BA461", "#B9C182", "#DBDFBE"
)

mapview(
  read_sf("watersheds.geojson"), 
  zcol = "huc4", 
  layer.name = "HUC10",
  legend = FALSE, 
  lwd = 0.8, 
  color = "#24292F",
  col.region = map_colors,
  alpha.regions = 0.4
)

```
